987270.name: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth3 Let's Get Nepucated
987270.description:
With the Let's Get Nepucated DLC, Neptune will ask a series of hard hitting questions that she'll need to know before she feels comfortable around you. Questions like ""Do you like me?"" and ""What food do I like?"" are definite tests for the true Neptune fan! Get to know Neptune better by asking her select questions too!

Let's Get Nepucated DLC unlocks:
- Nepucation event

How to unlock the new DLC: After DLC installation go to Planeptune and than access "Information". At "Information" a selection called "Nepucation" will appear so please select "Nepucation" to access the new events. You must get up to at least chapter 2 to unlock "Nepucation".
987270.supported_languages:
英语*, 日语*, 繁体中文
*具有完全音频支持的语言
